Events Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag developed in 1715. Pirates rule the Caribbean, and even established their own republic, where corruption, greed and cruelty at every step. Amidst all this confusion can be identified brash young captain named Edward Kenuey. His quest for fame he has earned the respect, comparable even with a black beard, but it also got him into an ancient war between Assassins and Templars. A war that could destroy everything that was built by pirates. In the role of a pirate-assassin Edward will visit more than 50 locations - the islands, towns, ports, fishing villages, hidden coves, shipwrecks, sugar plantations and even the thick jungle. In which of these areas and the order in which Edward gets depends only on the player - the developers have provided a completely open wor
